memberships.name: Executive Membership

benefits.name: 2% Annual Reward
benefits.details: 2% cashback on qualified Costco and Costco Travel purchases up to $1,250 per year

benefits.name: Executive Shopping Hours
benefits.details: Early access: Mon–Fri 9–10 a.m., Sat 9–9:30 a.m., Sun 9–10 a.m.

benefits.name: $10 Monthly Credit
benefits.details: $10 monthly credit on SameDay.Costco.com or Instacart orders of $150+

benefits.name: Extra Costco Services Benefits
benefits.details: Additional discounts on select Costco services

restrictions: 2% Reward excludes items such as tobacco, gasoline, Costco Shop Cards, certain prescription drugs, membership fees, taxes, shipping, and other exclusions per Costco policy
Purchases prior to upgrading do not qualify for the 2% Reward
Only purchases by the Primary or Primary Household Cardholder count toward rewards

memberships.name: Gold Star Membership

benefits.name: Standard Access
benefits.details: Shop all Costco warehouses and online at Costco.com

benefits.name: 2 Membership Cards
benefits.details: Primary cardholder plus one household member

limitations: No $10 Monthly Credit on SameDay Costco or Instacart orders
No additional benefits on Costco Services

upgrade_information.proration_policy: Upgrade fee prorated based on remaining membership months
upgrade_information.renewal_policy: At renewal, Executive Membership renews for $130/year
upgrade_information.cancellation: Memberships can be canceled or downgraded at any time, with 100% satisfaction guarantee
